#BMI Calculator

####Johannes Marais

####16 November 2015

##Description

The BMI is used to classify a person as underweight, normal weight, overweight or obese. The BMI value is calculated from the height and weight of a person.

The shiny application can be found [here](https://maraisj.shinyapps.io/BMI_Calculator).

##Instructions

Select imperial or metric system to your preference.
Move the top slider to your height in meters or the top two sliders to Feet and inches (if you chose the imperial system).
Move the bottom slider to your weight in kilograms or pounds (if you chose the imperial system).
Your BMI and BMI classification will be displayed in the results section.
